page.title: 10LIFESTYLE:A SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY
page.content: librarian duty or go to Needlework Club.In the afternoon,we might do History,Science,Geography,Art or Games,depending on the day.In the Summer term we have a Swimming lesson every day in the school pool.I am taking my RLSS Water Safety Award Stage 3.At 3.30 I walk home with my friends and then I watch television until tea at 4.30.After tea I go out to play until 8.30.We play games like "Arky"and "Mr Tidy"or ride our bikes. When I return home,I have a hot drink, bath,and then it's off to bed,where I read for a bit.
